005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.MetaschemaConstants;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IFeatureModelConstrained;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.ModuleUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
014
015public interface IAssemblyDefinition
016    extends IModelDefinition, IContainerModelAssembly, IAssembly, IFeatureModelConstrained {
017  IEnhancedQName MODEL_QNAME = IEnhancedQName.of(MetaschemaConstants.METASCHEMA_NAMESPACE, "model");
018
019  /**
020   * Check if the assembly is a top-level root assembly.
021   *
022   * @return {@code true} if the assembly is a top-level root, or {@code false}
023   *         otherwise
024   */
025  default boolean isRoot() {
026    // not a root by default
027    return false;
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * Get the root name if this assembly is a top-level root.
032   *
033   * @return the root name if this assembly is a top-level root, or {@code null}
034   *         otherwise
035   */
036  @Nullable
037  default String getRootName() {
038    // not a root by default
039    return null;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Get the root index to use for binary data, if this assembly is a top-level
044   * root.
045   *
046   * @return the root index if provided and this assembly is a top-level root, or
047   *         {@code null} otherwise
048   */
049  @Nullable
050  default Integer getRootIndex() {
051    // not a root by default
052    return null;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Get the XML qualified name to use in XML as the root element.
057   *
058   * @return the root XML qualified name if this assembly is a top-level root, or
059   *         {@code null} otherwise
060   */
061  default IEnhancedQName getRootQName() {
062    IEnhancedQName retval = null;
063    String rootName = getRootName();
064    if (rootName != null) {
065      retval = ModuleUtils.parseModelName(getContainingModule(), rootName);
066    }
067    return retval;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Get the name used for the associated property in JSON/YAML.
072   *
073   * @return the root JSON property name if this assembly is a top-level root, or
074   *         {@code null} otherwise
075   */
076  default String getRootJsonName() {
077    return getRootName();
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default boolean isInline() {
082    // not inline by default
083    return false;
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  default IAssemblyInstance getInlineInstance() {
088    // not inline by default
089    return null;
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  default IAssemblyDefinition getOwningDefinition() {
094    return this;
095  }
096  //
097  // @Override
098  // default IAssemblyNodeItem getNodeItem() {
099  // return null;
100  // }
101
102  @Override
103  default boolean hasChildren() {
104    return IModelDefinition.super.hasChildren() || IContainerModelAssembly.super.hasChildren();
105  }
106}
